posts.title: Introduction to React Hooks
posts.content: React Hooks are a powerful feature that allow you to use state and other React features without writing a class.

posts.title: Understanding JavaScript Closures
posts.content: Closures are an important concept in JavaScript that allow functions to have private variables.

posts.title: CSS Grid vs Flexbox
posts.content: Both CSS Grid and Flexbox are powerful layout systems, but they serve different purposes.

posts.title: TypeScript Best Practices
posts.content: TypeScript enhances JavaScript by adding types to the language, helping catch errors early.

posts.title: State Management in React
posts.content: Managing state effectively is crucial for building scalable React applications.

comments.content: Great introduction! Helped me understand hooks better.
Looking forward to more examples with useTransition.
Closures can be tricky, but this explanation helped a lot.
